column4: anyone know Are there any text editors for iPad that include line numbers to assist with programming?
how is that ubuntu support related?
gparted is on the ubuntu cd.. why do you need a new CD making?

I am on a Live CD and in gparted when I double click the extended partition that contains the logical partition it says (At least one logical partition is mounted). How can I fix this so I can increase the size of my linux partition
mount on it's own shows the currently mounted file systems
run:  gksudo gparted   then and it will be ok
you can unmount in cli then
what partition can you not unmount in the GUI?
well something has, so we need to find out
can you run:  sudo fdisk -l; mount    and pastebin the text using http://pastie.org
the support for Mint is separate to Ubuntus
Mint isn't supported here in any way
